briefTitle: Safety and Tolerability and Efficacy of LCZ696 in Japanese Severe Hypertensive Patients
officialTitle: A Multi-center, Open Label Study for Evaluation of the Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of 8-week Treatment With LCZ696 in Japanese Patients With Severe Hypertension

arms.label: LCZ696 400 mg plus other hypertension (HTN) medications

summary: This study assessed the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of LCZ696 in severe hypertensive Japanese patients

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs), Serious Adverse Events and Deaths

effectByArm.arm: LCZ696 400 mg Plus Other Hypertension (HTN) Medications
